author: wddgit
body:
#### PR description:

In HcalDigiDump.cc, migrate consumesMany to GetterOfProducts. It should behave the same as before.

#### PR validation:

This module is a utility to print out information to cout, but it is not used for anything else. There are no existing tests. I ran it manually on some data files I generated and it seems to print out information as one would expect.

FYI @makortel
title: HcalDigiDump.cc Migrate consumesMany to GetterOfProducts
